video.title: The Worst Witch
video.synopsis: After stumbling into a school for witches, a bumbling heroine comes to realize that she just might belong there. Based on Jill Murphy's beloved books.

episodes.synopsis: When a broomstick crash-lands on her balcony, Mildred Hubble hitches a ride to Cackle's Academy and begins her training as a newly minted witch.
episodes.title: Selection Day

episodes.synopsis: It's time for the first-years to choose their feline familiars. But fear of flying makes Mildred's cat, Tabby, a terrible co-pilot.
episodes.title: Tabby

episodes.synopsis: When a celebrity student arrives in rockstar fashion and takes a shine to Mildred, Ethel uses the girls' budding friendship to make Maud jealous.
episodes.title: New Girl

episodes.synopsis: When a spell gone wrong turns Ethel into a pig, she retaliates by turning Mildred into a frog, and Maud and Enid must work together to find her.
episodes.title: Pond Life

episodes.synopsis: The school's abuzz with excitement when the Great Wizard makes an impromptu visit and Miss Cackle taps Mildred to lead an aerial display.
episodes.title: The Great Wizard's Visit

episodes.synopsis: Mildred's plan to ace a history test backfires when a wisdom spell turns her into an old woman and forces her to impersonate a teacher.
episodes.title: The Best Teacher

episodes.synopsis: A panicked Maud uses a forgetting powder on Parents' Evening so no one will remember her mistakes. But now Mildred has forgotten their friendship.
episodes.title: Maud's Big Mistake

episodes.synopsis: When invitations go out for the first-year coven, Mildred's not sure she belongs ... until a hair-raising development helps change her mind.
episodes.title: The First Witch

episodes.synopsis: A competitive Miss Hardbroom plays hardball when a rival school comes to Cackle's Academy to compete in the Annual Spelling Bee.
episodes.title: Spelling Bee

episodes.synopsis: When heavy mist puts the school on lockdown, Mildred and Ethel sneak out to find a lost cat, only to find the academy much altered upon their return.
episodes.title: The Mists of Time

episodes.synopsis: While the other first-years focus on end-of-year exams, Ethel is desperate to learn the truth about Mildred, Miss Cackle and a shocking school secret.
episodes.title: Out of Bounds

episodes.synopsis: With a horrible new headmistress at the helm, the academy takes on a much darker tone. Is the "worst" witch the school's best chance for salvation?
episodes.title: The Worst Headmistress

episodes.synopsis: As the academy welcomes a new crop of first-years, Mildred makes a disastrous entrance, then accidentally destroys part of the school!
episodes.title: Tortoise Trouble

episodes.synopsis: A powerful spell binds Mildred and Ethel together until they've learned to get along. An enchanting new art mistress urges the girls to get creative.
episodes.title: The Friendship Trap

episodes.synopsis: While Mildred and her friends look for the missing Founding Stone, an ambitious Ethel uses magic to clone herself -- with alarming results.
episodes.title: Ethel Everywhere

episodes.synopsis: Miss Mould helps Mildred with her magic, and Beatrice reveals the source of her sneezing. A famed chantress's biggest fan has an even bigger secret.
episodes.title: The Extraordinary Esper Vespertilio

episodes.synopsis: A school assignment sends Mildred in search of her father, a man she's never met. Miss Drill can't wait for Sports Day -- but Maud's dreading it.
episodes.title: Mildred's Family Tree

episodes.synopsis: After playing a prank that ruins everyone's fun, Enid faces being expelled. Can Mildred "think small" to save her friend?
episodes.title: Bat Girl

episodes.synopsis: The second-years brave spooky Hollow Wood to gather potion ingredients. Esmerelda returns to the academy to visit her sisters.
episodes.title: Hollow Wood

episodes.synopsis: Preparations for Miss Cackle's birthday bash are underway, and the school's future is riding on its success. Cue a stressed-out Maud -- in miniature!
episodes.title: Miss Cackle's Birthday

episodes.synopsis: With Miss Cackle away -- and an important school inspection looming -- Beatrice conjures a spell to soften Miss Hardbroom.
episodes.title: Miss Softbroom

episodes.synopsis: Storm clouds part to reveal pink: It seems Miss Pentangle's come to teach some modern magic ... and possibly take over the school!
episodes.title: A New Dawn

episodes.synopsis: Mildred puts a love potion in Miss Bat's drink but accidentally gives it to all of the teachers. Elsewhere, Ethel reveals a surprising plan.
episodes.title: Love at First Sight

episodes.synopsis: The girls ask their ancestors for help reigniting the Founding Stone. Meanwhile, at the school Halloween party, magic's misfiring in every direction.
episodes.title: All Hallow's Eve

episodes.synopsis: With the academy in crisis -- and her friends trapped in a deep freeze -- Mildred considers a selfless sacrifice to save the day.
episodes.title: The Big Freeze

episodes.synopsis: Mildred starts the new term with skill and confidence but falters when she tries to win a flying contest with a particularly special prize.
episodes.title: The Wishing Star

episodes.synopsis: Some witches are more welcoming than others when Mildred's nonmagical mother, Julie, reports for duty as the school's new art teacher.
episodes.title: Double Hubble

episodes.synopsis: After turning her mother into a witch, Mildred worries she's made a mistake. Beatrice trains under Miss Tapioca and bakes up a revealing recipe.
episodes.title: Magic Mum

episodes.synopsis: Julie's newfound magic is a little out of control. Elsewhere, Ethel's so full of rage that she turns herself into a Swamp Troll.
episodes.title: The Swamp Troll

episodes.synopsis: A wise owl holds the key to solving two different problems: Beatrice needs help passing a potions exam, and Maud's cat is slowly disappearing!
episodes.title: The Owl and the Pussycat

episodes.synopsis: An addictive new game has the whole school under its spell -- with serious side effects. Meanwhile, students and teachers are going missing.
episodes.title: The Game

episodes.synopsis: When a guilty Mildred confesses her theft to Miss Hardbroom, it stirs up memories of a fateful friendship -- and a terrible mistake.
episodes.title: Bad Magic

episodes.synopsis: Indigo Moon returns to the academy, unaware that 30 years have passed since she turned into stone. Clarice wakes up with a bothersome boil.
episodes.title: The Cackle Run

episodes.synopsis: Enid casts a spell on her famous mother so they can spend more time together. Indigo's trying -- but failing -- to fit in, so she runs away.
episodes.title: Star Struck

episodes.synopsis: Mildred gets creative to stop Indigo from feeling so sad. Tension brews between Miss Tapioca and her daughter on the day of the Midsummer meal.
episodes.title: Finding Joy

episodes.synopsis: Faced with a mess before Indigo's examination, Mildred bewitches a broom -- and sparks a revolution. A mysterious witch comes looking for her dog.
episodes.title: The Broomstick Uprising

episodes.synopsis: On the day of Miss Bat's wedding, Mildred and Ethel team up to steal a priceless gift, and Beatrice, Sybil and Clarice bungle an important assignment.
episodes.title: Witch Switch

episodes.synopsis: An unlikely hero steps forward on the last day of school when an evil presence takes to the skies and threatens to destroy the academy.
episodes.title: Ethel Hallow to the Rescue

episodes.synopsis: Ethel's meddling leaves Mildred with a shocking new look. But to regain her original appearance, Mildred must complete a trio of impossible feats.
episodes.title: The Three Impossibilities

episodes.synopsis: The Head Girl contest has begun, and the candidates' first challenge is to summon their Familiar Auxiliar — the animal that dwells within.
episodes.title: Gertrude the Great

episodes.synopsis: It's Indigo's birthday — and she's growing up faster than expected. Elsewhere at the academy, a spell to help Izzy feel at home goes horribly awry.
episodes.title: Happy Birthday, Indigo Moon

episodes.synopsis: While Enid weighs whether to join her famous mom on tour, Mildred prepares for the second round of competition: the Great Debate.
episodes.title: Enid Nightshade, Superstar

episodes.synopsis: Ethel cuts down a special tree to win a nature-themed challenge and makes the forest very, very angry. Mabel's new health shakes are magically delicious.
episodes.title: The Forbidden Tree

episodes.synopsis: After Mildred chooses Enid to be her deputy, a wounded Maud makes over her personality with help from a secret "coolness" potion.
episodes.title: Maud's Magical Make-over

episodes.synopsis: A tempting offer to see her future lures Mildred to the lake — but she isn't the only one there. Miss Hempnettle sends Enid on an important errand.
episodes.title: The Crystal Lake

episodes.synopsis: On the day of the Witch World Games qualifier, a devastated Enid comes clean to Miss Drill, then makes a fateful decision.
episodes.title: Enid's Last Race

episodes.synopsis: Strange things have been happening all over the school ... but who's to blame? The next badge goes to the girl who can name the culprit.
episodes.title: Mildred the Detective

episodes.synopsis: Facing a challenging triathlon — and the fear of Ethel becoming Head Girl — a desperate Mildred bends the rules to turn back time.
episodes.title: A Witch in Time

episodes.synopsis: A stressed-out Mildred flies to Izzy’s farm to unplug, only to discover that her magic's stopped working. Back at school, Ethel stirs up trouble.
episodes.title: Grounded

episodes.synopsis: Mildred's entry for the final challenge of best new spell has disastrous consequences for Miss Cackle  — and for Mildred.
episodes.title: The Witching Hour Pt 1

episodes.synopsis: With the school's fate hanging in the balance, Mildred and friends team up to save the day and face a familiar enemy.
episodes.title: The Witching Hour Pt 2
